original_text: You boast, ‘We have made a covenant with death. Yes, we have made an agreement with Sheol. When trouble comes to our city like a deep flood of water, we will be safe. We trust in our lies to keep us safe.’ You boast, ‘We have made a covenant with death. Yes, we have made an agreement with Sheol. When trouble comes to our city like a deep flood of water, we will be safe. We trust in our lies to keep us safe.’
korean_text: 너희가 말하기를 우리는 사망과 언약하였고 스올과 맹약하였은즉 넘치는 재앙이 밀려올지라도 우리에게 미치지 못하리니 우리는 거짓을 우리의 피난처로 삼았고 허위 아래에 우리를 숨겼음이라 하는도다

sentences.original_text: 'We have made a covenant with death'
Yes, we have made an agreement with Sheol
When trouble comes to our city
like a deep flood of water
